snippet: The husband-and-wife team talk about their collaboration on Mr. Apatow's new comedy, "This Is 40," in which Ms. Mann and Paul Rudd reprise their roles as a married couple not unlike Mr. Apatow and Ms. Mann.
abstract: The husband-and-wife team talk about their collaboration on Mr. Apatow's new comedy, "This Is 40," in which Ms. Mann and Paul Rudd reprise their roles as a married couple not unlike Mr. Apatow and Ms. Mann.

headline.main: Strange Bedfellows: Judd Apatow and Leslie Mann on  'This Is 40'
